channel.title: Galkons Client Detailed question- probably and easy fix
channel.description:
Hey everybody! Welcome to summer! I have a question about Galkons clients default border colors. Their red and yellow and I freakin hate them :( The borders are not in the sprites folder and i am wondering how to change em! Thanks a ton in advance!
P.S. If you have a link to a client that has mostly everything in it as well as a "MUSIC" folder and a music tab where players can play music while they play i wont have to use Galkons client.
A message to Galkon --- Why oh why did you have to put such a huge antileach?????
:D

item.title: Galkons Client Detailed question- probably and easy fix
item.dc:creator: @cooper1423 cooper1423
item.description:
@cooper1423 wrote:

Thanks so much! Btw do you know of a client even better then galkons?

P.S. theres no Jframe or gui just Egui and this is all there is inside of it import java.awt.BorderLayout;
import java.awt.Cursor;
import java.awt.event.ActionEvent;
import java.awt.event.ActionListener;
import javax.swing.*;

public class EGUI
{

public EGUI()
{
}

public static void main(String args[])
{
    client.main(new String[] {
        "", "", ""
    });
}

}

Read full topic
item.source: Galkons Client Detailed question- probably and easy fix
